subject: Fashion
title: TikTok-Driven Micro Trends
description: A quick win: understand TikTok-Driven Micro Trends.

hook.text: A TikTok video goes viral Monday. By Friday the trend is at Zara.

buildup.text: Micro trends now cycle in weeks, not seasonsâ€”coastal grandmother, mob wife, quiet luxury.

discovery.text: TikTok's algorithm surfaces niche aesthetics to millions overnight.

twist.text: Trends die so fast that clothes bought for them are worn once or twice.

climax.text: The acceleration is fueling overconsumption faster than fast fashion ever could.

punchline.text: When trends last a week, style becomes disposable.

quiz.question: What is a micro trend?
options: A trend that lasts many years
A short-lived trend that cycles in weeks via social media
A trend only for children's clothing
